comments.body: Perhaps it could be interesting to use a generic here too instead of `any` as the return type?
I had originally written this as `export function asyncStorage<T>(identifier: string): T;` which worked better, but the linter complained about a single use generic.

https://github.com/Microsoft/dtslint/blob/master/docs/no-unnecessary-generics.md at the bottom is the case mentioned. I could disable that rule if that seems better, as I agree that the `any` is a little weird in this use case.
